> # Calculate cross-products
> cross_products <- calculate_cross_products(data, continuous_vars)
> 
> # Print the resulting cross-products matrix
> print(cross_products)
          Var1       Var2      Var3      Var4      Var5      Var6      Var7       Var8
Var1  1582.788   8219.112  23993.39  28311.11  28628.45  27967.28  35024.25   6136.126
Var2  8219.112  43848.301 126094.94 148818.32 150560.77 146949.32 184069.73  32263.223
Var3 23993.390 126094.940 377291.87 435463.09 440793.72 435011.87 539263.94  94436.126
Var4 28311.109 148818.320 435463.09 518727.01 519589.43 507453.54 635388.34 111247.034
Var5 28628.449 150560.768 440793.72 519589.43 531395.70 513479.65 643232.36 112602.047
Var6 27967.278 146949.320 435011.87 507453.54 513479.65 513389.04 628493.44 110007.436
Var7 35024.248 184069.732 539263.94 635388.34 643232.36 628493.44 787265.66 137803.312
Var8  6136.126  32263.223  94436.13 111247.03 112602.05 110007.44 137803.31  24446.407
> print("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
[1] "-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
> 
> 
> # Calculate covariance and correlation
> cov_corr <- calculate_covariance_correlation(data, continuous_vars)
> 
> # Print the resulting covariance matrix
> print(cov_corr$covariance)
            Var1      Var2      Var3      Var4      Var5       Var6        Var7       Var8
Var1  0.08137695 0.2880889 0.1826369 0.2417400 0.1819938  0.1818729 -0.01896551 0.05140069

Var6  0.18187288 2.4780191 7.5669139 8.8162073 9.2169643 12.9666464  2.57870512 0.42246414
